meanings.sent1: The reeded surface of the coin made it easy to grip.
meanings.sent2: The antique vase had a reeded pattern along its base.
meanings.sent3: The reeded edges of the bookshelf added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a reeded quality, like a flute playing a soft melody.
meanings.sent5: The reeded design on the doorknob was both functional and stylish.

meanings.definition: Decorated with parallel grooves or ridges
meanings.sent1: The reeded frame of the mirror gave it a vintage look.
meanings.sent2: The reeded columns outside the building added a classical touch.
meanings.sent3: The reeded border on the painting made it stand out in the gallery.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a reeded pattern, reminiscent of ancient sculptures.
meanings.sent5: The reeded trim on the curtains matched the overall theme of the room.

meanings.definition: Made with reeds or resembling reeds
meanings.sent1: The reeded basket was perfect for holding fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: The reeded chair blended well with the natural decor of the room.
meanings.sent3: The reeded hat gave her a charming and rustic look.
meanings.sent4: Her reeded sandals were comfortable for walking along the beach.
meanings.sent5: The reeded texture of the wallpaper brought a touch of nature indoors.
